mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, phone) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{phone});
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id};

select count(*) from member where pw=#{pw};
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{newpw}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where del = 'Y';
